# Script to make interactive map of COSQ data
# Should be run from the results folder, using the esv environment

```{r load data, echo=TRUE}
library(leaflet)

#Import metadata to get cluster coordinates
meta<-read.table("metadata/merged_metadata.txt", sep="\t", header=T, row.names=1)

#Import table of richness
rich<-read.table("ASV_table_clusters.tsv", sep="\t", row.names=1, check.names=FALSE)

```

```{r map}
options(browser = 'firefox')

leaflet(data = meta) %>% addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(~Longitude, ~Latitude, popup = ~as.character(habitat), label = ~as.character(habitat))
```
